vernac_cmds: Record TopologicalSpace : Type := { point_set : Type; open : Ensemble point_set -> Prop; open_family_union : forall F : Family point_set, (forall S : Ensemble point_set, In F S -> open S) -> open (FamilyUnion F); open_intersection2: forall U V:Ensemble point_set, open U -> open V -> open (Intersection U V); open_full : open Full_set }.
Lemma open_empty: forall X:TopologicalSpace, open (@Empty_set (point_set X)).
Lemma open_union2: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} (U V:Ensemble (point_set X)), open U -> open V -> open (Union U V).
assert (Union U V = FamilyUnion (Couple U V)).
Lemma open_indexed_union: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} {A:Type} (F:IndexedFamily A (point_set X)), (forall a:A, open (F a)) -> open (IndexedUnion F).
Lemma open_finite_indexed_intersection: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} {A:Type} (F:IndexedFamily A (point_set X)), FiniteT A -> (forall a:A, open (F a)) -> open (IndexedIntersection F).
assert (IndexedIntersection F = Intersection (IndexedIntersection (fun x:T => F (Some x))) (F None)).
assert (IndexedIntersection F = IndexedIntersection (fun x:X0 => F (f x))).
Lemma closed_complement_open: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} (U:Ensemble (point_set X)), closed (Ensembles.Complement U) -> open U.
Lemma closed_union2: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} (F G:Ensemble (point_set X)), closed F -> closed G -> closed (Union F G).
assert (Ensembles.Complement (Union F G) = Intersection (Ensembles.Complement F) (Ensembles.Complement G)).
Lemma closed_intersection2: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} (F G:Ensemble (point_set X)), closed F -> closed G -> closed (Intersection F G).
assert (Ensembles.Complement (Intersection F G) = Union (Ensembles.Complement F) (Ensembles.Complement G)).
Lemma closed_family_intersection: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} (F:Family (point_set X)), (forall S:Ensemble (point_set X), In F S -> closed S) -> closed (FamilyIntersection F).
assert (Ensembles.Complement (FamilyIntersection F) = FamilyUnion [ S:Ensemble (point_set X) | In F (Ensembles.Complement S) ]).
red in H0; red in H0.
Lemma closed_indexed_intersection: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} {A:Type} (F:IndexedFamily A (point_set X)), (forall a:A, closed (F a)) -> closed (IndexedIntersection F).
Lemma closed_finite_indexed_union: forall {X:TopologicalSpace} {A:Type} (F:IndexedFamily A (point_set X)), FiniteT A -> (forall a:A, closed (F a)) -> closed (IndexedUnion F).
assert (Ensembles.Complement (IndexedUnion F) = IndexedIntersection (fun a:A => Ensembles.Complement (F a))).
Hypothesis closedP_union2: forall F G:Ensemble X, closedP F -> closedP G -> closedP (Union F G).
Hypothesis closedP_family_intersection: forall F:Family X, (forall G:Ensemble X, In F G -> closedP G) -> closedP (FamilyIntersection F).
refine (Build_TopologicalSpace X (fun U:Ensemble X => closedP (Ensembles.Complement U)) _ _ _).
replace (Ensembles.Complement (FamilyUnion F)) with (FamilyIntersection [ G:Ensemble X | In F (Ensembles.Complement G) ]).
replace (Ensembles.Complement (Intersection U V)) with (Union (Ensembles.Complement U) (Ensembles.Complement V)).
constructor; apply NNPP; intro; contradiction H2; [ left | right ]; trivial.
apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split; auto with sets; red; intros.
Lemma Build_TopologicalSpace_from_closed_sets_closed: forall (F:Ensemble (point_set Build_TopologicalSpace_from_closed_sets)), closed F <-> closedP F.

assert (IndexedIntersection F = IndexedIntersection (fun x:X0 => F (f x))).
assert (Ensembles.Complement (Union F G) = Intersection (Ensembles.Complement F) (Ensembles.Complement G)).
assert (Ensembles.Complement (Intersection F G) = Union (Ensembles.Complement F) (Ensembles.Complement G)).
assert (Ensembles.Complement (FamilyIntersection F) = FamilyUnion [ S:Ensemble (point_set X) | In F (Ensembles.Complement S) ]).
red in H0; red in H0.
assert (Ensembles.Complement (IndexedUnion F) = IndexedIntersection (fun a:A => Ensembles.Complement (F a))).
refine (Build_TopologicalSpace X (fun U:Ensemble X => closedP (Ensembles.Complement U)) _ _ _).
replace (Ensembles.Complement (FamilyUnion F)) with (FamilyIntersection [ G:Ensemble X | In F (Ensembles.Complement G) ]).
replace (Ensembles.Complement (Intersection U V)) with (Union (Ensembles.Complement U) (Ensembles.Complement V)).
constructor; apply NNPP; intro; contradiction H2; [ left | right ]; trivial.
apply Extensionality_Ensembles; split; auto with sets; red; intros.
